about_the_game:
- Available in Resurrection: Nuke Island:

Complete Resurrection: Nuke Island Game

Complete the Mission and Fight against the Threat to Home Land

In the first part of the Resurrection series, Resurrection: Nuke Island, Roman is tasked to rescue the abducted scientists by the DPK forces in the secret man-made island. DPK forces are planning to extend their boundaries destroying the peaceful democratic nations with their newly developed advanced weapons. Home Land's Secret Operative Roman should find and rescue the abducted scientists and face brutal situations in island and acquire any secret information available

Time to Start

Welcome to the world of Resurrection: Nuke Island, the first part of Resurrection Series with great collections of maps and heavy single player action. All the maps are open world 3D with new modes and gameplay features and will be available at launch to get everyone started

High Intensity Action Levels

Find and rescue abducted scientists while surviving and fighting hordes of zombies and tranches of enemy soldiers in the largest maps. Massive chases to catch enemies and race against time for completing the critical missions in saving the home land before the attack happens and many top secrets to discover

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

legal_notice: This game is a work of fiction. Any names, characters, places, and events portrayed in this game are entirely fictional or are used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual countries, individuals, organizations, or real-world events is purely coincidental. The use of real country names is for gameplay purposes only and is not intended to represent or imply any political or cultural affiliations. This game does not endorse or reflect any real-world ideologies or conflicts.
name: Resurrection : Nuke Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: quad core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1050-Ti (4GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 570 (4GB) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system, better to have SSD for faster game experience
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Quad core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 2060 (6GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 5700 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system, better to have SSD for faster game experience

short_description: An alarm raised when CIA found that 8 scientists are missing from international virology conference. CIA started investigation and found that North Korean scientists are also missing and suspected North Koreans. Roman, special ops commando has to evacuate scientists from North Korea.
